Fieldwork: Our team consists of experienced locals with knowledge about the in and outs of how local businesses operate. We'll help you bring you business to India without worrying about navigating the complex culture.
Sample Collection: We'll collect samples, timely and reliably on your behalf.
Sample Delivery: We'll get your samples delivered to your chosen location. Let us worry about shipping.
Documentation: Navigating documentation can be tough. We'll guide you on what documents you need and when you need them.
Inspection: Verifying your exporter's claims such as factory size, clearance, hygiene, manufacturing conditions.
Dispatch: We'll ensure that your goods are dispatched timely and as per your agreed conditions. No more unnecessary delays.
Follow Up: We'll personaly stay in touch with the delivery partners and your exporters and update you regularly about the on-ground situation
Quality Check and Control: We'll run quality checks and get lab tests done on your goods and samples, as per your requirements, right at the factory floor.
Market Research: Local information and interaction is invaluable. Our team is dedicated to finding vendors and sources for your business that are highly competetive in both prices and quality.
And much more: A whole slew of services depending on your requirements and needs. Contact Us to discuss what can be worked out
